# Opportunities with the BBC {#bbc}

Do you want to make software for the BBC? Are you graduating in 2026? Their software engineering graduate scheme has just opened for applications. It's a two-year graduate scheme offering four six-month rotations across different teams and technologies including JavaScript, Python, Scala, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Java, Kotlin and Swift. You'll also learn from industry experts and gain access to world-class training through the BBC Academy. The scheme is designed for individuals with some software development experience, details below for anyone graduating in 2026.
